name: Drill Arena
description: Fight in a brutal battle between robots with drills. In the arena there are only you and your opponents. Only the most sturdy and agile robot will survive!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 125 MB available space Sound Card: Any
